main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: Designed to brighten undereyes and cover even the most stubborn dark circles, this creamy, blendable formula instantly neutralizes discoloration and layers perfectly under concealer. Available in 16 color-correcting pink- and peach-based shades formulated for all types of undereye discoloration.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: To find your shade, take a look at the discoloration under the eye. If it’s bluish-purple, choose a bisque shade. If it’s greenish-brown, choose a peach shade. If it’s a mix of both, choose a peach bisque shade.
sub_detail.feature: Using the Concealer Brush (sold separately), apply Corrector to areas of discoloration, getting as close to the lashline and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger.

detail.sub_detail_2: Using the Concealer Brush (sold separately), apply Corrector to areas of discoloration, getting as close to the lashline and innermost corner as possible. Gently blend with your finger.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: The perfect complement to a smokey eye look, this kohl-pigmented mascara delivers high drama by creating extremely black, stretched-out lashes in an instant. Plus, the long-wearing formula holds its own against flaking, smudging, sweat and humidity.
feature: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\Cera Carnauba\Cire De Carnauba

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Builds volume lash by lash as opposed to traditional volumizing formulas that create the appearance of volume by clumping lashes together. Plus, a thicker brush base evenly combs through eyelashes from roots to ends, while a tapered tip grabs those small, hard-to-reach lashes.
sub_detail.feature: Brush from base to tips of lashes and let dry.

detail.sub_detail_2: Brush from base to tips of lashes and let dry.

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: A long-wearing brow pencil with a slanted, chiseled tip that lets you softly fill in brows with the flat edge or boldly define them with the pointed tip. Plus, the attached spoolie diffuses color and combs hairs into place for a naturally polished look. Waterproof and sweat resistant.

sub_detail.title: How to use
sub_detail.description: Use the flat side of the pencil to fill in the head of the brow, and then with the pointed tip use short strokes to define the arch and tail. For a bolder look, use the pointed tip to define the length of the brow, and then go over the edges for added definition. Comb hairs into place using the attached spoolie.
sub_detail.feature: Use the flat side of the pencil to fill in the head of the brow, and then with the pointed tip use short strokes to define the arch and tail. For a bolder look, use the pointed tip to define the length of the brow, and then go over the edges for added definition. Comb hairs into place using the attached spoolie.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: Daily suppOur Moroccan Argan Oil is completely unrefined and imparts a natural scent.This scent is not an indication of rancidity. Argan Oil that does not have a scent is refined and offers reduced benefits.ort formula for hair and skin

sub_detail.title: Technology
sub_detail.description: Natural Moisturizing Factors (NMF) are elements that keep the outer layer of the skin protected and well-hydrated.
sub_detail.feature: NMF are made up of multiple amino acids, fatty acids, triglycerides, urea, ceramides, phospholipids, glycerin, saccharides, sodium PCA, hyaluronic acid and many other compounds that are naturally present in the skin.

detail.sub_detail_2: This formula offers non-greasy hydration that acts as a direct topical supplement of impaired NMF components. It contains 11 amino acids, phospholipids, alpha/beta/gamma fatty acids

main_detail.title: INGREDIENTS
main_detail.description: Surface hydration formula

sub_detail.title: Directions
sub_detail.description: Apply after serums as needed for effective surface hydration. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children
sub_detail.feature: This formula offers non-greasy hydration that acts as a direct topical supplement of impaired NMF components. It contains 11 amino acids, phospholipids, alpha/beta/gamma fatty acids

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: Multi-technology peptide serum

sub_detail.title: Technology
sub_detail.description: This formula combines a comprehensive array of studied technologies to target multiple signs of aging at once. The technologies are Matrixyl 3,000 peptide complex (with palmitoyl-pentapeptide 35), Matrixyl Synthe'6 peptide complex (with palmitoyl tripeptide-38), Syn-Ake peptide complex (with dipeptide diaminobutyroyl benzylamide diacetate)
sub_detail.feature: We are deeply grateful to our devoted customers for loving us and our products so much. Our lab has and continues to devote countless hours to share the newest innovations with our broader world. The Ordinary now offers a wide range of products under the Vitamin C, Peptide and Direct Acid categories, and to help our ever-growing, loving family of users build functional and effective routines incorporating these products we have developed an introductory guideline into the brand.

detail.sub_detail_2: Apply to the entire face in the AM and PM after cleaning. If irritation occurs, cease use and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

main_detail.description: The new eye-opening volume mascara that creates a cat-eye effect. Powerful and captivating, lashes are extended, beautifully styled and fanned out.
feature: The mascara delivers an intense clump-free finish and all-day wear
while lashes remain soft and flexible.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: The cone-shaped tip can be used to stretch out the outer corner lashes to emphasise a cat-eye look.
sub_detail.feature: The innovative hour glass-shaped brush, made with elastomer, hugs, stretches and separates each lash to deliver incredibly fanned-out lashes, defined length and eye-opening volume from corner to corner.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: The new all-in-one tool for full and flawless brows.
feature: the watercolour-like formula mimics the look of natural hairs and fills in gaps where necessary.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: The brow builder is designed for effortless application with a customisable finish.
sub_detail.feature: Full Brows features a two-step approach – a water-based liner to define and fill on one end with a powder-wax shadow to build and set on the other.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: An Exceptionally-Stable, Direct-Acting Form of Vitamin C

sub_detail.title: Technology
sub_detail.description: Since this formulation is a water-free solution, it may feel slightly "oily" for a few seconds after application, despite the absence of all oils.
sub_detail.feature: An exceptionally-stable solution of 15% Ethylated Ascorbic Acid, this water-free formula offers a direct-acting approach to achieving a radiant, healthy-looking skin tone. Unlike other Vitamin C derivatives, this ethylated form acts directly like Vitamin C, is closer in molecular weight to actual Vitamin C which allows for faster visible results, and offers a much better stability profile than any known direct-acting form of Vitamin C.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A face cleanser that contains only the essential ingredients for cleansing and removing make-up, with cocobetaine, a gentle, cleansing surfactant combined with 4 caring ingredients.
feature: Contains only the essential ingredients for cleansing and removing make-up
cleansing surfactant combined with 4 caring ingredients.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Make-up remover. Anti-Discomfort. Anti-Dryness.Removing impurities.
sub_detail.feature:
Ultra-safe formulation charter : fragrance-free. Contains 4 sothing and protecting active ingredients.
The perfect solution for sensitive skin which enjoys the pleasure and freshness of rinsing with clear water.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: MAKE-UP REMOVER MILK gently removes waterproof make-up and respects skin's physiological balance. It also purifies, soothes and protects the skin.
feature: With La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: High make-up removal efficacy and cleansing agents selected for an optimal tolerance.
sub_detail.feature:
Massage onto the skin with the fingertips or using a soft cotton ball.
Then apply SOOTHING LOTION to complete the make-up removal.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: Illuminating Hydrating Fluid
feature: ultra-powerful ingredient created through a specific process

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Featuring a lightweight fluid texture, this refreshing face moisturizer is drenched in camellia water to intensely hydrate skin. The illuminating formula leaves the complexion prepped for makeup with a glowing, even-toned appearance.
sub_detail.feature: HYDRA BEAUTY CAMELLIA WATER CREAM combines Camellia Alba PFA*—a powerful extract that helps skin maintain optimal moisture levels—with hyaluronic acid, vitamins C and E and Blue Ginger PFA* for a complexion that appears refined, replenished, radiant and plump.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: MICELLAR WATER ULTRA Sensitive Skin cleanses skin of impurities, removing make-up and pollution. It also soothes the skin to provide comfort and freshess.
feature: With La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Formulated with micelles and glycerin, MICELLAR WATER ULTRA Sensitive Skin cleanses skin of impurities, removing make-up and pollution
sub_detail.feature:
Soak a cotton pad with product.
First remove make-up from the lips, then the eyes (one cotton pad per eye) then the rest of the face, until the cotton pads are no longer stained. For greater effectiveness and to limit rubbing, hold the cotton pad against the skin for a few seconds before gently wiping.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A mild lactic acid superficial peeling formulation
feature: Apply a small amount of the product onto a clean area of skin on the upper forearm

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Lactic Acid is an alpha hydroxy acid that exfoliates the skin. This 5% formulation offers very mild exfoliation and is supported with a purified Tasmanian pepperberry known to reduce signs of inflammation and sensitivity that is often associated with exfoliation.
sub_detail.feature:
This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative to help reduce irritation associated with acid use. This derivative is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally and this colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time.
Contraindications: Lactic Acid should not be used on sensitive, peeling or compromised skin. Please refer to additional sun protection note and other warnings in provided Directions.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: With 7% glycolic acid, amino acids, aloe vera, ginseng and tasmanian pepperberry

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Glycolic Acid is an alpha hydroxy acid that exfoliates the skin. This 7% toning solution offers mild exfoliation for improved skin radiance and visible clarity. The formula also improves the appearance of skin texture with continued use
sub_detail.feature: This formula contains a studied Tasmanian Pepperberry derivative to help reduce irritation associated with acid use. This derivative is of plant origin and varies in colour seasonally and this colour variation may be apparent in the formula from time to time. The formula is further supported with inclusion of ginseng root and aloe vera for both visible radiance and soothing benefits.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: SUBSTIANE Serum helps to deeply replenish skin's volume whilst increasing density and bounce, for fuller looking skin.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: An active anti-ageing serum developed specifically for mature and sensitive skin. Helps to increase skin's density and volume, thus restoring bounce and fullness to mature skin.
sub_detail.feature:
The unique formula is enriched with LR2412 + LINACTYL + PRO-XYLANE™, a unique combination of highly concentrated active ingredients to help restore skin's volume.
Its rich, creamy, melt-in serum texture provides a “skin-holding” effect.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A lightly tinted mineral-based formula that protects skin from sun damage and fortifies it with state-of-the-art antioxidants.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: RESIST Super-Light Daily Wrinkle Defense SPF 30 contains a special blend of a lightly tinted, pure mineral zinc oxide sunscreen along with a diverse blend of antioxidants known to boost skin’s environmental defenses and prevent premature aging of skin, all with an exceptionally silky, light-matte feel.
sub_detail.feature: An age-fighting formula that protects and fortifies skin. You’ll see a more even-looking skin tone from first use, and with daily use you’ll see that skin feels and looks firmer. This unbelievably light and silky moisturizer perfectly preps skin for makeup.The SPF 30 is a significant benefit as it decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun if used as directed with other sun protection measures.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A remarkable skin-renewing anti-aging moisturizer that nourishes dehydrated skin while promoting a firmer-looking, radiant complexion.
feature: Advanced formula targets all signs of aging
Retinol helps improve the appearance of wrinkles
Use as the last step in your PM skincare routine

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: RESIST Barrier Repair Moisturizer goes beyond moisturizing to deliver an innovative mix of research-proven ingredients known to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, dull skin tone, and loss of firmness.
sub_detail.feature: Helps prevent moisture loss while still feeling light on skin. Its silky lotion texture is infused with retinol to visibly reduce the appearance of wrinkles and to firm skin. It also has a unique complex of antioxidants that reduce the effects of environmental assault.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: This refreshing electrolyte-charged formula replenishes thirsty skin’s water content for lasting, weightless hydration and an instant plump, dewy look.
feature:
magnesium & potassium energize skin
Airy lightweight texture
Use as the last step in your PM skincare routine

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: The electrolytes in this quenching formula work with natural hydrators to draw the right amount of moisture into skin and hold it there
sub_detail.feature: Mineral electrolytes calcium, potassium, and magnesium are linked with skin-identical PCA (pyrrolidone carboxylic acid, part of skin’s natural moisturizing factor), allowing them to work within skin’s water channels (aquaporins) to deliver vital hydrators like ceramides and glycerin. These enhanced minerals also train skin to maintain its moisture balance, strengthen its barrier, and create a healthier, more energized appearance.

title: Redness Relief Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: An age-defying moisturizer formulated for soothing skin relief and drenching hydration. Gentle nourishment for visible plumping, radiance, and diminished appearance of wrinkles.
feature: Nourishing plant oils and antioxidants soothe skin
Enriches skin to ease redness & sensitivity
Silky soothing cream leaves a radiant finish
Use as the last step in your PM skincare routine

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: CALM Redness Relief Moisturizer Normal to Dry Skin contains specially-selected soothing plant extracts and skin-replenishing ingredients known to visibly soothe sensitive skin and red areas.
sub_detail.feature: Provides soothing relief for dry, reddened skin. Its custom mix of gentle plant oils, antioxidants, smoothing emollients, and skin-replenishing ingredients leaves a dewy, radiant finish. Dry skin is smoothed, luxuriously softened, and bolstered with what it needs to look younger and hydrated. Gentle enough even for skin prone to rosacea.

title: Redness Relief SPF 30 Mineral Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin

main_detail.description: A mineral-based sunscreen that replenishes dry, sensitive skin with smoothing hydration while protecting it against damaging UVA/UVB rays.
feature: Use as the last step in your AM skincare routine

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: CALM Redness Relief SPF 30 Mineral Moisturizer Normal to Dry Skin combines the gentlest mineral-based sunscreen ingredients in a creamy advanced formula. You will have beautiful hydrated skin with the improved appearance of fine lines, dullness, and uneven skin tone. Sensitive skin will be comforted and cushioned with soothing emollients and a skin-enriching texture.
sub_detail.feature: A redness-minimizing mix of soothing plant extracts, antioxidants, and peptides work to calm sensitive skin so it looks visibly younger and feels healthier. With daily use, skin will become less prone to temporary redness and visible signs of sensitivity, and, most important, may help to lower the risk of premature skin aging. The pure mineral zinc oxide sunscreen decreases the risk of skin cancer and early skin aging caused by the sun if used as directed with other sun protection measures. Gentle enough even for skin prone to rosacea.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: Very dry and irritated hands have a depleted protective skin barrier due to repeated stresses (such as climatic conditions and frequent cleansing)
feature: With La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Enriched with moisturising and repairing agents, LIPIKAR Xerand restores the skin barrier and protects the epidermis from external irritants.
sub_detail.feature: 100% of Lipikar Xerand Shea Butter comes from a socially responsible sourcing program in Burkina Faso.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: This leave-on body exfoliant with 2% BHA, also known as salicylic acid, gently exfoliates built-up layers of dead skin to reveal the radiant, smooth skin hiding underneath.
feature: 2% salicylic acid softens and refines rough skin
Antioxidants safeguard skin and keep it healthy
Silky lightweight lotion feels beautiful on skin
clogged pores on the arms and legs

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Weightless Body Treatment 2% BHA is unlike any body lotion you may have tried because of its unique skin-smoothing benefits that become visible from the first use
sub_detail.feature: Works from the first application to visibly make rough, dry skin a thing of the past. Ongoing use banishes dullness and promotes resilient skin that’s touchably soft and ultimately smooth. This is a customer favorite, suitable even for skin prone to keratosis pilaris.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: An advanced moisturizing body lotion that gently gives skin the transforming power of pure retinol to help diminish the appearance of uneven skin tone and rejuvenate the feeling of soft firmer skin.
feature: Pure retinol & antioxidants help transform skin
Natural butters & plant oils beautifully hydrate skin

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Retinol Skin-Smoothing Body Treatment melds key anti-aging ingredients normally seen in facial moisturizers into a silky-textured, lightweight, and thoroughly hydrating body lotion for all skin types
sub_detail.feature: Uses a specialized retinol complex and potent antioxidants to intensively smooth and soften skin from the neck down. This silky, concentrated lotion, energized by the power of retinol, goes to work immediately to hydrate dry skin as well as give skin the essential ingredients it needs to look younger. Soothing emollients and plant oils provide an instant, healthy-looking glow you’ll love seeing and feeling.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A dry shampoo that absorbs oils and keeps hair clean.
feature: Delivers fresh scent throughout the day

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Achieve clean and fresh-smelling hair with Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo
sub_detail.feature: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold canister about 6-10" away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: INTENSE HYDRATING MILK COMFORT AND FIRMNESS

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Its soft, creamy texture with fresh floral notes is instantly absorbed by the body.
sub_detail.feature:
At the heart of the formula, an advanced moisturising active ingredient guarantees 24-hour moisturising action.
The Purple Bengle PFA* active ingredient offers firming action on collagen fibers.
The royal jasmine wax elixir ensures protection and comfort for the skin.

main_detail.title: WHAT IT IS
main_detail.description: A lush combination sure to send any heart a flutter, this blend of vanilla, soft florals, and ripe berries goes on sweet and dries down sexy.

sub_detail.title: WHY IT'S DIFFERENT
sub_detail.description: Intense Hydrating Milk Comfort and Firmness moisturizes, protects and firms the skin. Its soft, creamy texture with fresh floral notes is instantly absorbed by the body.
sub_detail.feature: Intense Hydrating Milk Comfort and Firmness, skin is soft, supple and firmer. It is soothed and enhanced.
